name: Mobatia Technologies
overview:
ABOUT US

Mobatia is a global software services organization with a strong focus on new generation technology platforms. We own few highest grossing software solutions in Android/iOS market and we also offer top quality cost effective software development services to enterprises. We offer innovative technology software solutions that ranges from Productivity, Mobility and Entertainment to small and medium enterprises all over the world. Mobatia is selected as one of this year’s Red Herring 100 Asia finalists. This is a great achievement and big recognition and we thank all our clients for supporting us all through these days Our software portfolio includes Web, Mobile app development and UX design services. Mobatia cater services for the unique business requirements of our clients. We have developed enterprise-grade products for several successful companies and have earned the reputation of being a high-end service provider who is also cost-effective. Though we have a small team, we have strong experience in developing and delivering software solutions with at most perfection and quality. Our competencies in Agile methodologies and processes have helped us meet our commitment and responsibility to achieve our milestones. This is how we achieve it. We use iterative and agile development methodologies such as SCRUM for application development. By using top class business process and technology solutions such as Connectwise and our own software solutions, we ensure that the projects stay on track. We also ensure personalized attention to each and every client. So if you are in need of getting your complex business requirement productized and monetized, Mobatia is a one stop solution for you!

VALUES

We believe in building lasting relationships with our clients beyond business. We always deliver our services way more than what our customer expects and their service levels.

VISION

To be the most innovative and the preferred technology partner for business leaders across the geographies.
